[vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”0″ top_padding=”0″ bottom_padding=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”0″ shift_y=”-5″][vc_column column_width_percent=”95″ position_vertical=”middle” override_padding=”yes” column_padding=”4″ style=”dark” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ align_medium=”align_center_tablet” medium_width=”0″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″ css=”.vc_custom_1487104202951{padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”-3″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”fontsize-145926″ text_height=”fontheight-524109″ text_font=”font-148806″ text_color=”color-prif” sub_reduced=”yes” css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_delay=”200″]Brand identity is one of the key elements that sets you apart from your competitors. The look and feel of everything from your visual communications, like marketing collateral, email graphics infographics, and presentations, to your online presence of social marketing graphics and even logo design tell the story of your brand. Graphic design is the foundation your brand identity is built on. The right graphic design talent produce deliverables that inspire, attract, engage, and convert consumers. 

 

Our digital marketing recruiters understand the complexity of producing quality graphic design. The most straightforward path is to partner with a creative marketing staffing agency and hire Graphic Designers who are vetted, experienced, and the right fit for your team with the specific design aesthetic your company or clients are looking for. From full-time Digital Designers to freelance Graphic Designers, the flexible graphic design talent in our expansive network will elevate your pitch decks and refine your targeted email and social campaigns to drive increased clicks, conversions, and leads. [/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″ medium_visibility=”yes” mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”1″
